# Install
```sh
pip install clitify
```

# Run
```sh
# Like a song
splike

# Move song position
spseek +10 # +10 seconds
spseek -2.5 # -2.5 seconds

# List song queue when on playlist
spq
```

# Source
[![github.com/marcpartensky/clitify](https://cdn-icons-png.flaticon.com/512/25/25231.png)](https://github.com/marcpartensky/clitify))
